bug.author: ytyfeng
bug.summary: Documentation of crop function is wrong
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:http://www.open3d.org/docs/release/python_api/open3d.geometry.PointCloud.html#open3d.geometry.PointCloud.crop>http://www.open3d.org/docs/release/python_api/open3d.geometry.PointCloud.html#open3d.geometry.PointCloud.crop</denchmark-link>
In Python binding, there is no such function as . To crop a point cloud, the correct function name is . Similarly, there is no such function as . To crop a triangle mesh, the correct function name is .

comments.comment: Never mind. My version of Open3D is the older one, 0.7.0.0.
